welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Appenweier, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Black Forest Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Entzheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Entzheim Airport, mainly used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Karlsruhe/Baden-Baden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
